name: Whey Protein Concentrate 80%
desc: Whey Protein Concentrate (WPC) 80% is obtained in the production of sweet whey with the use of an advanced ultrafiltration process at very low temperatures. Such treatment reduces a certain amount of non-protein components in order to receive a product with protein levels amounting to a minimum of 80%.
techs: The final product of Whey Protein Concentrate 80% comes in the form of a free-flowing, homogenous powder of creamy white to yellow color, without foreign odors or tastes. Whey Protein Concentrate is unflavored and thus can be given any flavor or aroma.
shelf: The shelf life of Whey Protein Concentrate 80% is about 12 months. The product should be stored in a dry, clean warehouse with a max. temperature of 25Â°C and relative humidity max. 75%.
packaging: Foodcom supplies its Business Partners with Whey Protein Concentrate 80% in bags of 15, 20, 25 kg or in Big Bags.
applications: Some of the most popular applications of Whey Protein Concentrate 80% are diet foods and sports nutrition, yet the range is wide. It can also be a substitute for eggs in many products, thus lowering the risk of possible contamination.
